name: REGISTRY_CONFIG
description: This table contains basic information about the registry configuration, including information about the import specifications used and the type of registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the registry record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.
